statusDetails.message:
Don't know how to encode patientInfo={"firstName":"Happy","foodCategory":"VEGAN","lastName":"Diwali","allergy":"Peacan","contactNumber":"1122334455","email":"sweets@gmail.com","dateOfBirth":"2003-06-05"} as a byte stream.

Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type.
For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("multipart/form-data", ContentType.TEXT))). .."

steps.name: When  Dietician calls "Create New Patient" with "post" http request
Then  the API call got success with a status code 200
And  verify the patient id created
